meanings.definition: A person who gossips or spreads rumors.
meanings.sent1: The tattlers in school always had something to say about everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the tattlers in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The group of tattlers made up stories about the missing cookies.
meanings.sent4: The tattlers' whispers spread through the classroom like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the tattlers, for their words can travel far and wide.
